english.segment1: A summer drive away from dying: a broken heart nothing to lose. I know it hurts so bad just trying to please the ones you hate to love. And I wrote this note about someone I used to know. so I'd remember how life can be so short when your left alone to wonder. how it is someone opens and shuts the door.
english.segment2: I know your cold but come home. It's a shame how short we all have come.
english.segment3: You set your mind on cruise control; knuckles grip the wheel in fear to let it go. Love is empty,love is cruel,love it blindly breaks the rules. How could you have been a fool?. It's something all of us go through. You choke back tears and swallow lies but those wiper blades won't fix you eyes, count on having clouded vision for at least a little while.
english.segment4: And I know you're cold but come home: it's a shame how short we all have come. And I know you're cold but come home.
english.segment5: Please don't face the headlights of the oncoming cars along. We wont forget the past. We wont forget the past. (And I know you're cold). Say all the answers and I will let you go. I wont look back. and I wont look back. Say all the answers. and I will let you go. I will let you go. I will let you go
english.segment6: Say all the answers and I will let you go. I won't look back. I won't look back. [x3]
english.segment7: Please don't face the headlights of the oncoming cars along. and I will let you go.
